Features.About the policy: A simple policy loaded with essential benefits

Entry Age.Adults: 18 to 65 years (Parent and parent-in laws can be covered in a single policy)
Entry Age.Dependent children: 3 months to 25 years, children can be covered along with parent/s) Note: Beyond 3 Children can also be covered in a single policy

Features.Medical Screening: Persons above 50 years of age medical screening is required

Coverage.Room Rent (Rs) (per day): Up to 2% of the Sum insured max of Rs.5000
Coverage.ICU (Rs) (Per day): Up to 5% of sum insured max of Rs 10,000
Coverage.Day Care Procedures: All Day care procedures are covered
Coverage.Cataract (Rs): Up to 25% of Sum insured or Rs.40,000 whichever is lower per each eye in one policy year

Features.NCB: 5% in respect of each claim free policy year subject to a maximum of 50%
Features.Tax benefits: Available under section 80 D of the IT Act in respect of the premium paid by any mode other than cash

Waiting Period.For Specific diseases: 24 consecutive months (Full list refer the policy wording)
